description.value:
Requirement Flexible Tactics

Your army launches a probing attack meant to trick the enemy into thinking you are attacking from one quarter while your real thrust comes elsewhere.

Critical Success The target army's defenses are thrown off; it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.ibcMcEGRbPRtk9Pu]{outflanked} until the end of your turn.

Success The target army is fooled, but only momentarily. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.ibcMcEGRbPRtk9Pu]{outflanked} against the next melee Strike your army attempts against it before the end of your current turn.

Critical Failure The enemy anticipates your feint and presses the advantage. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.ibcMcEGRbPRtk9Pu]{outflanked} by the target army until the end of your next turn.
